Customers consider it a must-have for fall and winter, and appreciate its warmth, with one mentioning it's fairly thick. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for the cooler months!
items.body: This dress is going to be great for fall and winter. It is a of a heavier weight and quality than I anticipated for the price. The fit was true to size for me based on the chart provided by the manufacturer. It is soft and comfy and the fit and flare style gives it a nice shape and structure. It also has a small puff sleeve at the shoulder that is feminine and pretty. I can't wait to wear it, I think I'm going to get some good value out of it! It's casual enough to be versatile and it was a good price too. I got the green, it is a nice muted color. Read more
items.author: Kristin C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!
items.body: It exceeded my expectations. The fabric is very comfortable and warm to wear, the fit is perfect, and it has pockets! The size is as advertised, so you can buy it without hesitation! Read more
items.author: Luana

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Would recommend.
items.body: Cute and comfortable. Can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: BaconPancakesMakingBaconPancakes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress for fall/winter
items.body: Nice material, feels and looks decent quality. I’m 5’5” and 165 postpartum and got the large and it fits well. The green color is nice I got it so I can wear for Christmas but it’s not a true Christmas type green so it will look great in the fall as well Read more
items.author: Emily

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars All around great value!
items.body: Pre washed it in cool water, hung to dry as I do all of my laundry. Was very comfortable, fit well, looked great and very affordable. Read more
items.author: Judy Yuhas

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute design however......
items.body: Nice design, comes in several colors, however the material is almost see through. Definitely would not be able to withstand the cold winter of any midwestern state located in the US. You'll need another layer underneath. A long ankle length coat with warm boots would also do the trick. Buy this dress and keep shopping for thick tights and then you'll be good to go. "If you live in a cold winter environment" Read more
items.author: M M of Milwaukee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fall Must Have!
items.body: Love this dress! I was pleasantly surprised by this sweater dress. I read a review that said it was very thin. I did not find the material thin at all. Great texture and color. I paired today for work with brown tights and boots. Very cute. I like shoulder accents and band around the wrists. I think it is an excellent value. Can be worn with leggings also. I would definitely order again. I ordered the caramel color. It is true to size. Also has handy pockets. It is a must have for fall and winter! Read more
items.author: Paula Foster

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Length
items.body: Very comfy and warm. Length is just right! Greta for the holiday season. Read more
items.author: Isabel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Fuchsia, Apricot, Black, Caramel, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
